snippet: Mayor Cory A. Booker carried a neighbor out of a burning house Thursday night. They were both taken to a local hospital, where Mr. Booker was treated for smoke inhalation.
abstract: Mayor Cory A Booker of Newark, NJ, rescues a neighbor from her burning house; both are taken to a local hospital, where Booker is treated for smoke inhalation.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Cory A. Booker carried a neighbor out of a burning house Thursday night. They were both taken to a local hospital, where Mr. Booker was treated for smoke inhalation.

headline.seo: Cory Booker, Newark Mayor, Saves Woman From House Fire
headline.main: In Newark, Mayor Saves a Woman From a Fire
headline.print_headline: In Newark, Mayor Saves A Woman From a Fire
